channel.title: Learning Gitpod (and other stuff) on Gitpod Hugo Pipeline Development Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Learning Gitpod (and other stuff) on Gitpod Hugo Pipeline Development Blog

item.title: The Future of Blogging!
item.description: Featured Photo by Pero Kalimero on Unsplash In my last post, I mentioned that I’m trying some new things and I am going to use this post to elaborate a bit on what those things are and why I think this is the best place to be spending my time. First a bit about options for running a website: They suck There’s really no point in trying to find a website that does everything you want and is cheap and easy.

item.title: My first live post! (sort of)
item.description: I would love to say that I have been diligently working on this post for days. In reality, I prototyped the page last night and I’m basically building this site specifically to test a method for quickly building unique static sites. I will be updating the site as I go, and it will have more and prettier functionality soon, but for now, UNDER CONSTRUCTION

item.title: Contact
item.description: (this is a placeholder until I get around to making one for me) This is an example of a custom shortcode that you can put right into your content. You will need to add a form action to the the shortcode to make it work. Check out Formspree for a simple, free form service. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message
